Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Geospatial Data Cloud (GSCloud), with the service website at http://www.gscloud.cn, was founded by the Computer Network Information Center of the Chinese Academy of Sciences in 2008. It is an internationally advanced and domestically influential geospatial big data platform. The platform closely focuses on the urgent needs of researchers in geospatial data search, acquisition, storage, analysis and visualization. It uses new-generation information technologies such as cloud computing and big data to independently develop a reliable large-scale geospatial data real-time analysis engine, and realizes efficient management of billions of metadata and PB-level entity data analysis services. The platform continuously innovates service models and successfully realizes real-time online analysis services for massive data, online crowdsourcing innovation services, and online collaborative annotation services. After more than a decade of development, GSCloud has established a complete geospatial data resource reserve, bringing together dozens of international remote sensing satellite data and domestic resources, high-resolution and other series of land observation satellite data, and producing geospatial data products with independent intellectual property rights. GSCloud has accumulated 800TB of physical data, 520,000 registered users, 13 million total visits, 260 million total page visits, 1.1PB of online data services, 100,000 online tasks, more than 10,000 scientific research projects, and more than 12,000 Chinese and English literature outputs. It has greatly promoted the open sharing of data in my country, saved a lot of scientific research costs, and generated significant social benefits. The platform's core technology "Key Technologies and Applications for Large-Scale Geospatial Data Cloud Services" won the second prize of Beijing Science and Technology Progress in 2016, and the platform's core product "GeoBox" won the "Leading Scientific and Technological Achievements New Product Award" at the 2021 Big Data Expo.
